column2: The A24 Challenge - Complete Filmography of A24
column5: I compiled every movie by A24 here by date of release, as reported on their website a24films.com. At some point I want to watch all of these in order, because at the time of making this list Iâ€™ve watched less than a third of them despite claiming A24 to be my favorite production company. I will consider this a goal to be achieved though I do not know when.
